feed.title: InvenTree | News
feed.subtitle: InvenTree is an open-source inventory management system which provides intuitive parts management and stock control. It is at the center of an ecosystem of addins for EDA tools, API wrapper, deeply integrated plugins and 3rd party tools.

entry.title: Governance and Security
entry.content:
Governance and Security

In preparation for the upcoming InvenTree 1.0 release, we released new pages detailing project governance and security policies. It is recommended to read the threat modelling document, which outlines the security considerations for deploying InvenTree instances.
